elements.text: Presenting a structured editor in a code notebook. I think I'm going to enjoy this environment

text: How do you push changes to consumers? Suppose I'm updating a function and want the new one used downstream? Do you plan some sort of push or pull mechanism?

elements.text: How do you push changes to consumers? Suppose I'm updating a function and want the new one used downstream? Do you plan some sort of push or pull mechanism?

text:
Why do you want the new one used downstream? because if you want other people to change their code I am not keen to facilitate that within the language.
However I am thinking there should be a way to broadcast information about changes. potentiall something like an @library syntax that is a moveable reference. though it still resolves to a hash that is then captured by any hashes you derive for your program
